name: FP Front End Login Form
author: FP Team

sections.description:
FP Front End Login helps you to manage user login from front end. This plugin provides shortcode and widget to integrate Login form on wordpress pages/posts.

Features:
* Easy Installation
* WordPrss textdomain support
* Easy to translate in other language using textdomain
* WordPress Multisite support
* Easy To understand
* Shortcode available
* widget available

How it Work?:
1- Install and activate
2- Use [fp_login_form] in pages/posts or Fp Front End Login Widget in sidebar
sections.installation:
You can choose any below-listed method to install this plugin.

Dashboard Method:

  1. Login to your WordPress admin and go to Plugins -> Add New
  2. Type “FP Front End Login Form” in the search bar and select this plugin
  3. Click “Install”, and “Activate Plugin”

Upload Method:

  1. Unzip the plugin and upload the “FP Front End Login Form” folder to your ‘wp-content/plugins’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

You can choose any below-listed method to install this plugin.

Dashboard Method:

  1. Login to your WordPress admin and go to Plugins -> Add New
  2. Type “FP Front End Login Form” in the search bar and select this plugin
  3. Click “Install”, and “Activate Plugin”

Upload Method:

  1. Unzip the plugin and upload the “FP Front End Login Form” folder to your ‘wp-content/plugins’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress

short_description: FP Front End Login plugin allows you to add a log-in form to your wordpress site by using shortcode and Widget.
